constantValues: Physical or logical part of a vehicle or device.

definitions.description: Physical or logical part of a vehicle or device.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: behavior

constantValues: Describes if the component is fixed, movable or replaceable.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'behavior_display' is added to the 'DeviceComponent' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'behavior'
addSupportingAttribute.name: behavior_display

members.description: Describes if the component is fixed, movable or replaceable.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: componentDeviceId

constantValues: Reference to a separate sub-device that the component may represent.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Reference to a separate sub-device that the component may represent.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: configurationOptionId

constantValues: Specific option for the component on the device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Specific option for the component on the device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceId

constantValues: Parent vehicle or device that contains the component.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Parent vehicle or device that contains the component.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceMeterId

constantValues: Reference to a meter that the component may represent.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Reference to a meter that the component may represent.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceSensorId

constantValues: Reference to a sensor that the component may represent.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Reference to a sensor that the component may represent.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: parentComponentId

constantValues: Larger component for which the component is a part.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Larger component for which the component is a part.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: specificationAccessoryId

constantValues: Accessory for which the component is a part.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Accessory for which the component is a part.
